title: Trump says auto tariffs likely to start at 25% - and grow
shortDescription: "It will be 25% and higher, and it will go very substantially higher over a course of a year," Trump said on Tuesday.

title: RFK Jr. promised to protect 9/11 responders; Trump, Musk cuts hit
shortDescription: Up to 20% of staff at the WTC Health Program were impacted by cuts of probationary workers and buyouts, U.S. senators said in a letter.

title: Trump team pushes Romania to lift restrictions on Andrew Tate: Reports
shortDescription: Trump aide Richard Grenell reportedly intervened on behalf of influencer Andrew Tate, who's accused of human trafficking and rape.

title: Trump, Musk give joint TV interview airing Tuesday night: How to watch
shortDescription: President Donald Trump and Elon Musk are set to appear in an interview with Fox News host Sean Hannity on Tuesday night.

title: Trump's mass firings are illegal, not-performance based, lawyers say
shortDescription: The lawyers for fired federal workers say the Trump administration didn't follow federal law in terminating probationary employees.

title: Who's leading DOGE? Not Elon Musk, the White House says
shortDescription: Even though President Trump named Elon Musk the head of DOGE, the White House claims Musk is actually a White House senior advisor with no authority.

title: Starliner astronauts react to Trump saying they were 'abandoned'
shortDescription: Butch Wilmore and Suni Williams recently told CNN they want to "change the rhetoric" about the two astronauts being "stuck in space."

title: 'Leaked' Trump health record fabricated, began as satire | Fact check
shortDescription: The image is fabricated, the Pennsylvania Department of Health confirmed. The supposed document originated from a satirical account.

title: Hegseth accuses Biden of politically motivated move to rush tax audit
shortDescription: Secretary of Defense Pete Hegseth posted a picture to X of what appears to be a tax notice showing he owes more than $33,000 in taxes.

title: Did Trump just give Byron Donalds the nod for Florida governor?
shortDescription: Were Byron Donalds to run for Florida governor, he'd handily beat opponents, according to a poll shared by Trump. What do SWFL residents think?

title: 'Push back': See photos of anti-Trump, Musk protests sweeping nation
shortDescription: Protestors across the country took to the streets Monday to repudiate the actions of Elon Musk and the Trump administration. See the photos.

title: Could Trump's birthday be a federal holiday? Bill proposes just that
shortDescription: Rep. Claudia Tenney introduced a bill that would make Trump’s birthday a federal holiday to recognize him as 'the founder of America's Golden Age.'

title: Rubio meets Saudi crown prince over Trump's Gaza plan
shortDescription: President Trump infuriated the Arab world by proposing the residents of Gaza be resettled in other Arab nations while the U.S. leads reconstruction.

title: President's Day protests rally against Trump administration actions
shortDescription: "Not My President's Day" protests are being held in cities across the nation on Presidents' Day against the Trump administration.

title: Fake quote on tax transparency attributed to Sen. Warren | Fact check
shortDescription: There is no evidence Warren said the quote in the post. It doesn’t appear on her website or social media accounts.
